casebody.data:
James M. STACKPOLE
v.
CITY OF STAMFORD et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 2, 2018

The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn.App. 908, 178 A.3d 454 (2018), is denied.

McDONALD and ROBINSON, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
